#!/usr/bin/env bash
#
# This file has been automatically generated with devid on {{.Date}}
# Please remember that running 'devid rehash --persona {{.Name}}' will 
# overwrite this file :)

if [ "${{.ActiveProfile}}" != "" ]; then
	echo "A profile is already loaded (${{.ActiveProfile}}). Loading a new profile on top may leak credentials."
	echo "Are you sure you want to continue?"
	select yn in "Yes" "No"; do
		case $yn in
			Yes ) break;;
			No ) exit;;
		esac
	done
fi
if [ "${{.ActiveProfile}}" == "{{.Name}}" ]; then
	echo "This profile is already loaded, stopping."
	exit 0
fi
export {{.ActiveProfile}}='{{.Name}}'
export {{.ActiveProfilePath}}='{{.Location}}'
 
# plugins BEGIN ##################
{{.RenderedPlugins}}
# plugins END ####################

exec {{.Shell}} -l
